name: TJX Companies, Inc.
summary: The TJX Companies, Inc. is the world’s leading off-price retailer of apparel and home fashions, operating nearly 5,000 stores across nine countries under brands such as T.J. Maxx, Marshalls, and HomeGoods. The company leverages a global vendor network to provide brand-name merchandise at significant discounts. Headquartered in Framingham, Massachusetts, TJX is a Fortune 500 company and a major player in the retail sector.
